channel.title: Federated Learning on Mahrokh Ghoddousi Boroujeni
channel.description: Recent content in Federated Learning on Mahrokh Ghoddousi Boroujeni

item.title: Personalized Federated Learning of Probabilistic Models: A PAC-Bayesian Approach
item.description: This paper introduces PAC-PFL, a personalized federated learning algorithm that leverages PAC-Bayesian theory and differential privacy to enhance model accuracy and calibration for heterogeneous clients, validated through experiments on various datasets. Under review.
